text:
Happy weekend, all! I'm hoping most of you aren't here... but if you do happen to be around:

Does anybody know if you can set a variable to be equal to the value of another variable.

``` e.g. {% set variable_a = "16" %} {% set variable_b = {{ variable_a }} %} 
      and output of variable_b = 16
```

Annnnd... I've answered my own question. For the sake of making this available to anyone else who might have the same question, the answer is:
``` {% set variable_b = variable_a %} ```

no mustaches, quotes, or braces.
